Verses: 1 indha Varththamaanangalukkuppinbu, Seraayaavin Kumaaranaagiya Esraa, Persiyaavin Raajaavaagiya Ardhasashtaa Arasaalugira Kaalaththile Baabilonilirundhu Vandhaan; Indha Seraayaa Asariyaavin Kumaaran, Ivan Ilkkiyaavin Kumaaran.
2 ivan Salloomin Kumaaran, Ivan Saadhokkin Kumaaran, Ivan Agidhoopin Kumaaran,
3 ivan Amariyaavin Kumaaran, Ivan Asariyaavin Kumaaran, Ivan Moraayodhin Kumaaran,
4 ivan Seraagiyaavin Kumaaran, Ivan Oosiyin Kumaaran, Ivan Pukkiyin Kumaaran,
5 ivan Abisuvaavin Kumaaran, Ivan Pinegaasin Kumaaran, Ivan Eleyaasaarin Kumaaran, Ivan Pradhaana Aasaariyanaana Aaronin Kumaaran.

6 indha Esraa Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Aruliya Moseyin Nyaayappramaanaththile Therina Vedhapaaraganaayirundhaan; Avanudaiya Dhevanaagiyakarththarudaiya Karam Avanmel Irundhadhinaal, Avan Kettavaigalaiyellaam Raajaa Avanukkuk Koduththaan.

7 avanodekooda Isravel Puththirarilum, Aasaariyarilum, Leviyarilum, Paadagarilum, Vaasal Kaavalaalarilum, Nidhaneemiyarilum, Silar Ardhasashtaa Raajaavin Ezhaam Varushaththile Erusalemukkup Ponaargal.
8 aindhaam Maadhaththil Avan Erusalemukku Vandhaan; Adhu Andha Raajaavin Ezhaam Varushamaanadhu.

9 mudhalaam Maadham Mudhalthedhiyile Avan Baabilonilirundhu Prayaanamaagap Purappattu, Aindhaam Maadham Mudhalthedhiyile Than Dhevanudaiya Dhayavulla Karam Thanmelirundhadhinaal Erusalemukku Vandhaan.
10 karththarudaiya Vedhaththai Aaraayavum, Adhinpadi Seyyavum, Isravelile Kattalaigalaiyum Needhinyaayangalaiyum Ubadhesikkavum, Esraa Than Irudhayaththaip Pakkuvappaduththiyirundhaan.

11 karththarudaiya Karpanaigalin Vaarththaigalilum, Avar Isravelukkuk Koduththa Kattalaigalilum Padiththuth Therina Vedhapaaraganaagiya Esraa Ennum Aasaariyanukku, Raajaavaagiya Ardhasashtaa Koduththa Sannadhin Nagalaavadhu:

12 raajaadhiraajaavaagiya Ardhasashtaa Paralogaththin Dhevanudaiya Nyaayappramaanaththaip Podhikkira Uththama Vedhapaaraganaagiya Esraa Ennum Aasaariyanukkup Poorana Samaadhaanamundaaga Vaazhththi Ezhudhugiradhu Ennavendraal:
13 nammudaiya Raajyaththil Irukkira Isravel Janaththilum, Adhin Aasaariyarilum Leviyarilum, Unnodekooda Erusalemukkup Poga Manappoorvamaayirukkira Yaavarum Pogalaam Endru Nammaale Uththaravaagiradhu.
14 nee Un Kaiyilirukkira Un Dhevanudaiya Nyaayappramaanaththinpadi, Yoodhaavaiyum Erusalemaiyum Visaariththu Nadaththavum,
15 raajaavum Avarudaiya Mandhirimaarum Erusalemil Vaasampannugira Isravelin Dhevanukku Manappoorvamaaik Koduththa Velliyaiyum Ponnaiyum,

16 baabilon Seemaiyengum Unakkuk Kidaikkum Ellaa Velliyaiyum Ponnaiyum, Unnudaiya Janamum Aasaariyarum Erusalemilulla Thangal Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukkendru Manaurchaagamaaik Kodukkum Kaanikkaigalaiyum Nee Kondupogavum, Nee Raajaavinaalum Avarudaiya Ezhu Mandhirimaaraalum Anuppappadugiraai.

17 aagaiyaal Andhath Thiraviyaththinaal Nee Thaamadhamindri Kaalaigalaiyum Aattukkadaakkalaiyum, Aattukkuttigalaiyum, Avaigalukkaduththa Pojanapaligalaiyum, Paanapaligalaiyum Vaangi, Avaigalai Erusalemilulla Ungaldhevanudaiya Aalayaththup Palipeedaththinmel Seluththuvaayaaga.
18 meedhiyaana Velliyaiyum Ponnaiyum Kondu Seyyavendiyadhu Innadhendru Unakkum Un Sagodhararukkum Nalamaaith Thondrugirapadi Adhai Ungal Dhevanudaiya Siththaththinpadiye Seyyungal.
19 un Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Aaraadhanaikkaaga Unakkuk Kodukkappatta Panimuttugalaiyum Nee Erusalemin Dhevanudaiya Sannidhiyil Oppuvikkakkadavaai.
20 pinnum Un Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukku Avasiyamaaik Kodukkavendiyiruppadhai, Nee Raajaavin Kajaanaavilirundhu Vaangik Koduppaayaaga.

21 nadhikku Appuraththilirukkira Ellaa Kajaansigalukkum Ardhasashtaa Ennum Raajaavaagiya Naam Idugira Kattalai Ennavendraal, Paralogaththin Dhevanudaiya Nyaayappramaanaththaip Podhikkum Vedhapaaraganaagiya Esraa Ennum Aasaariyan Nooruthaalandhu Velli, Nootrukkalakkodhumai, Nootrukkala Dhraatcharasam, Nootrukkala Enneymattum Ungalaik Ketpavai Ellaavatraiyum,
22 vendiya Uppaiyum, Thaamadhamillaamal Kodukkavum,

23 paralogaththin Dhevanudaiya Karpanaiyinpadiye, Edhu Thevaiyaayirukkumo Adhuvellaam Paralogaththin Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththirku Jaakkiradhaiyaai Seluththappadavum Vendum; Raajaavum Avar Kumaararum Aalum Raajyaththinmel Kadunkobam Varuvaanen.

24 pinnum Aasaariyarum, Leviyarum, Paadagarum, Vaasal Kaavalaalarum, Nidhaneemiyarum, Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Panividaikkaararumaana Oruvanmelum Pagudhiyaagilum Theervaiyaagilum Aayamaagilum Sumaththalaagaadhendru Avargalaikkuriththu Ungalukku Ariyappaduththugirom.

25 pinnum Nadhikku Appuraththilirundhu Un Dhevanudaiya Nyaayappramaanangalai Arindha Sagala Janangalaiyum Nyaayam Visaarikkaththakka Thuraigalaiyum, Nyaayaadhipadhigalaiyum, Esraavaagiya Nee Unnilulla Undhevanudaiya Gnaanaththinpadiye Erpaduththuvaayaaga; Andhap Pramaanangalai Ariyaadhavargalukku Avaigalai Ubadhesikkavunkadavaai.

26 un Dhevanudaiya Nyaayappramaanaththinpadiyeyum, Raajaavinudaiya Nyaayappramaanaththinpadiyeyum Seyyaadhavanevanum Udane Maranaththukkaagilum, Dhesaththukkup Purambaakkudhalukkaagilum, Abaraadhaththukkaagilum, Kaavalukkaagilum Theerkkappattuth Thandikkappadakkadavanendru Ezhudhiyirundhadhu.

27 erusalemilulla Karththarudaiya Aalayaththai Alangarikka, Ippadippatta Yosanaiyai Raajaavin Irudhayaththil Aruli, Raajaavukkum Avarudaiya Mandhirimaargalukkum Raajaavin Kaikkullaana Balaththa Ellaa Magaapprabukkalukkum Munbaaga Enakkuththayavu Kidaikkappannina Engal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Sthoththiram.
28 appadiye En Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Karam Enmel Irundhadhinaal Naan Thidankondu, Isravelil Sila Thalaivarai Ennode Koodavarumpadi Serththukkonden.
